summary: A unique travelling caravan home abode. CHOOSE WHERE TO PARK YOUR HOME FROM 15 LOCATIONS!
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/278/bannerutk.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://SkyrimGEMS.com/images/badge_featured_sm.png[/img][/url][/center]

[center][color=Green][font=\"Book Antiqua\"][size=4]Description[/size][/font][/color][/center]

Have you ever wanted to take your house with you, to whatever settlement you go to in Skyrim? Well now you  can! With the Travelling Caravan, taking your home to another city couldn\'t be easier. The map in the Caravan allows you to choose from 15 locations to park up your home-on-wheels:

[center][img]http://img208.imageshack.us/img208/9647/mapmarker.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://img547.imageshack.us/img547/5498/mapmarker2.jpg[/img][/center]

The Caravan is fitted with a:
~Bed
~Cooking Spit
~Alchemy Station
~1 Mannequin
~1 Weapon Rack
~Plenty of Storage
~The travel map

You can also tell where your caravan is in the world and fast travel to it with ease.

[img]http://img267.imageshack.us/img267/4779/movingmarkers.jpg[/img]


[center][color=Green][font=\"Book Antiqua\"][size=4]Requirements[/size][/font][/color][/center]

Skyrim: YES
Dawnguard: NO
Hearthfire: NO
SKSE: NO

[center][color=Green][font=\"Book Antiqua\"][size=4]Future Updates[/size][/font][/color][/center]

~[s]A Small quest to obtain the caravan[/s]
~Player customisation on the interior

[center][color=Green][font=\"Book Antiqua\"][size=4]Installation[/size][/font][/color][/center]

1) Download the main file, samv96UKsTravellingCaravan.rar and extract the contents to your Skyrim>Data Folder.

2) Make Sure that the .esp is checked under data files.

3) [color=Red]You will find the caravan in a starting point of Whiterun, near the Stables![/color]

[center][color=Green][font=\"Book Antiqua\"][size=4]Uninstallation[/size][/font][/color][/center]

1) Simply delete all files related to this mod.

[center][color=Green][font=\"Book Antiqua\"][size=4]Videos[/size][/font][/color][/center]


[youtube]G9A0Abm6g-8[/youtube][youtube]ukYYCbFdfmQ[/youtube]
[youtube]DeIxWTfCJ_4[/youtube]

[center][color=Green][font=\"Book Antiqua\"][size=5]If you enjoy this mod, remember to leave an endorsement as it really helps out![/size][/font][/color][/center]

[size=5][font=Book Antiqua][center][b][u]My other Mods[/u][/b][/font][/size]

[url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/705069-rochebere-a-brand-new-city-coming-soon/][img]http://img98.imageshack.us/img98/1109/rocheberebanner.png[/img][/url]
